items.sentence: Let's not waste our time trying to convince Tom to do that.
Is there someplace around here where I can charge my phone?
I reached the summit of the mountain in exactly five hours.
They were all so tired that they could do nothing but yawn.
The plane had already taken off when I reached the airport.
Tom secretly read Mary's diary while she was taking a bath.
Why didn't you tell me that you didn't know how to do that?
It's very beautiful here, but I wouldn't want to live here.
Neil Armstrong was the first astronaut to walk on the moon.
In baseball, the pitcher is the player who throws the ball.
